price: Nama isin irraa (hojii gaariidhaan) fuulduratti deemuu, yookiin duubatti hafuu fedheef (akeekkachiistuu dha).
arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ يَتَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: liman shāa minkum an yataqaddama aw yata-akhara
